name: Space Wars - Crush the Enemies
description:
You are about to encounter on a journey to your freedom. This is not going to happen without a fight!

The new race called the "Mosquitoes" are threatening the Universe. They are getting stronger, bigger, better, destroying everything around them. Your mission is to restore the balance of the Universe and defeat the new outbreak with force. It's contagious and only you can stop it. You may need to travel thousands of miles to conquer the enemies, but remember what's at stake here. The freedom of your fellow Earthlings and yourself.

Big spacecrafts are coming for you equipped with powerful weaponry we've never seen before. Hundreds of other ships are coming to destroy everything. Your mission is to stop them. You have few specials to help you out like Energy SHIELD that's not penetrable for few seconds, EMP (Electromagnetic) Blast to destroy all enemy ships within your range and much more!

We count on you. Let's the battle to restore the balance of the Universe begins NOW!

Play now, it's FREE!
